dcterms:description: A domain-specific question answering dataset centered around the NBA domain, generated using LLMs, specifically GPT-4, to create questions based on NBA-related entities and relevant background knowledge.
dcterms:title: NBA domain-specific question answering dataset

dcterms:creator: Denny Vrandeˇci´c
Markus Krötzsch
dcterms:description: A free collaborative knowledge base that provides structured data for various entities, including those related to the NBA.
dcterms:title: WikiData knowledge base

dcterms:description: A list of NBA entities extracted from the NBA Wikipedia page using the Wikipedia API, containing unique entities relevant to the NBA.
dcterms:title: NBA entity list extracted from Wikipedia

dcterms:description: Training samples created by the authors for knowledge injection, designed to enhance the factual knowledge of LLMs.
dcterms:title: Knowledge injection training samples

dcterms:creator: Stephanie Lin
Jacob Hilton
Owain Evans
dcterms:description: A dataset designed to measure how models mimic human falsehoods, providing a benchmark for evaluating the factual accuracy of generated responses.
dcterms:title: TruthfulQA

dcterms:creator: Andreas Vlachos
Christos Christodoulopoulos
Arpit Mittal
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for fact extraction and verification, providing benchmarks for evaluating the factual accuracy of generated responses.
dcterms:title: Fact-Checking benchmarks
